#summary This page contains information about adding flags to the Cachechu interface.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

=Adding Flags=
  # Download [http://cachechu.googlecode.com/files/flags-1.3.zip flags-1.3.zip].
  # Extract the *geoip* and *flags* folders to your Cachechu install directory.
  # The hosts and services pages should now have a flags column on the left.
